key_risks: Billing practices and legal challenges, including class-action lawsuits and intellectual property disputes
Regulatory and reimbursement challenges, including potential changes in healthcare policies and insurance coverage denials
Ethical and privacy concerns related to handling sensitive genetic data
Competitive pressures from rivals like Illumina, Invitae, and Myriad Genetics
controversies: Multiple class-action lawsuits alleging unfair billing practices and overcharging for tests
$292.5 million jury award to Guardant Health in a false advertising lawsuit
$96.3 million verdict in a patent dispute with CareDX
SEC complaint alleging misleading disclosures related to billing and collection practices
social_issues: Potential misuse or breaches of sensitive genetic data, raising privacy concerns
governance_issues: Legal and regulatory scrutiny over billing practices and disclosures
Intellectual property disputes and competitive risks
